sourcesContent:
import { Thread, ThreadPost } from '@/types/thread';

const threadPost1: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-1',
  authorId: '1',
  parentId: null,
  rootId: 'thread-post-1',
  content: 'Just experienced the most incredible sunset at Camps Bay üåÖ The colors were absolutely breathtaking! #CapeTown #SunsetVibes',
  type: 'image',
  mediaUrls: ['https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506905925346-21bda4d32df4?w=800'],
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 2 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 234,
  comments: 45,
  revibes: 12,
  saves: 67,
  isLiked: false,
  isRevibed: false,
  isSaved: false,
  hasThread: true,
  threadCount: 3,
};

const threadPost2: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-2',
  authorId: '1',
  parentId: 'thread-post-1',
  rootId: 'thread-post-1',
  content: 'The best part? I met this amazing street musician playing the most soulful jazz. Had to capture this moment üé∑‚ú®',
  type: 'video',
  mediaUrls: ['https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/ForBiggerBlazes.mp4'],
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 1.5 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 189,
  comments: 32,
  revibes: 8,
  saves: 45,
  isLiked: false,
  isRevibed: false,
  isSaved: false,
  hasThread: true,
  threadCount: 2,
};

const threadPost3: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-3',
  authorId: '1',
  parentId: 'thread-post-2',
  rootId: 'thread-post-1',
  content: 'And to top it all off, found this hidden gem of a coffee shop nearby. Their cappuccino is *chef\'s kiss* ‚òïÔ∏èüíØ',
  type: 'image',
  mediaUrls: ['https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511920170033-f8396924c348?w=800'],
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 1 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 156,
  comments: 28,
  revibes: 5,
  saves: 34,
  isLiked: false,
  isRevibed: false,
  isSaved: false,
  hasThread: false,
  threadCount: 0,
};

const threadPost4: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-4',
  authorId: '2',
  parentId: null,
  rootId: 'thread-post-4',
  content: 'üßµ Thread: Let me tell you about my journey from zero to launching my first app...',
  type: 'text',
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 5 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 567,
  comments: 89,
  revibes: 45,
  saves: 234,
  isLiked: true,
  isRevibed: false,
  isSaved: true,
  hasThread: true,
  threadCount: 5,
};

const threadPost5: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-5',
  authorId: '2',
  parentId: 'thread-post-4',
  rootId: 'thread-post-4',
  content: '1/ Started with just an idea and a lot of coffee. Spent 3 months learning React Native from scratch. The learning curve was steep but worth it! üì±üíª',
  type: 'text',
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 4.5 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 445,
  comments: 67,
  revibes: 34,
  saves: 189,
  isLiked: true,
  isRevibed: false,
  isSaved: false,
  hasThread: true,
  threadCount: 4,
};

const threadPost6: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-6',
  authorId: '2',
  parentId: 'thread-post-5',
  rootId: 'thread-post-4',
  content: '2/ Built my first prototype in 2 weeks. It was buggy, ugly, but it WORKED. That feeling of seeing your creation come to life is unmatched! üöÄ',
  type: 'image',
  mediaUrls: ['https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551650975-87deedd944c3?w=800'],
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 4 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 389,
  comments: 54,
  revibes: 28,
  saves: 156,
  isLiked: false,
  isRevibed: false,
  isSaved: false,
  hasThread: true,
  threadCount: 3,
};

const threadPost7: ThreadPost = {
  id: 'thread-post-7',
  authorId: '3',
  parentId: null,
  rootId: 'thread-post-7',
  content: 'üéµ New music thread! Sharing my top 5 tracks that are on repeat this week. Starting with this absolute banger...',
  type: 'voice',
  voiceUrl: 'https://example.com/voice/intro.mp3',
  voiceDuration: 25,
  createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 8 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
  likes: 892,
  comments: 134,
  revibes: 67,
  saves: 445,
  isLiked: false,
  isRevibed: true,
  isSaved: false,
  hasThread: true,
  threadCount: 5,
};

export const mockThreads: Thread[] = [
  {
    id: 'thread-1',
    rootPostId: 'thread-post-1',
    posts: [threadPost1, threadPost2, threadPost3],
    totalEngagement: 1234,
    isCollaborative: false,
    isTrending: true,
    vibeScore: 89,
  },
  {
    id: 'thread-2',
    rootPostId: 'thread-post-4',
    posts: [threadPost4, threadPost5, threadPost6],
    totalEngagement: 2567,
    isCollaborative: false,
    isTrending: true,
    vibeScore: 95,
  },
  {
    id: 'thread-3',
    rootPostId: 'thread-post-7',
    posts: [threadPost7],
    totalEngagement: 1538,
    isCollaborative: false,
    isTrending: false,
    vibeScore: 78,
  },
];
